Name: Missing Love
About the game: -Warning- English version available now on demo English Buy version coming soon ; ) -Plot- In the early 2000s Somewhere in America, There is a serial killer who calls himself the Love Killer who likes to murder any couple indiscriminately. Making choices for information or changing the ending altogether.
